Name: Friendly Units
Description: Target all friendly units (i.e. allies + hero)

Name: Stealthed Allies
Description: Target all friendly units with Stealth

Name: Friendly Melee Zone
Description: Target slots in friendly melee zone

Name: Friendly Ranged Zone
Description: Target slots in friendly ranged zone

Name: Friendly Any Zone
Description: Target slots in any friendly zone

Name: Trap Trigger
Description: Targets the unit which triggers the trap card

Name: Friendly Grave Allies
Description: Target X allies in your grave

Name: Any Deck
Description: Target either your deck or the enemy's deck

Name: Adjacent Enemy Allies
Description: Targets adjacent enemies to a primary target
